description: zxAnMasMacMoving means the mac move is generated and successful.
If zxAnMasMacMoveReportEnable is enable, zxAnMasMacMoving may be
generated when a MAC entry is moving between two interfaces.

event.Summary: MAC ($v1) move is generated and successful

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoving ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogMacAddr s EXAMPL ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogVid i 9999 ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogFromIfIndex i 9999 ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogFromSubIfIndex i 9999 ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogToIfIndex i 9999 ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogToSubIfIndex i 9999

description: This value indicates the MAC address that move between
zxAnMasMacMoveLogFromIfIndex and zxAnMasMacMoveLogToIfIndex on
zxAnMasMacMoveLogVid. This object is instantiated only when
zxAnMasMacMoveReportEnable value is set to enable(1) and a MAC
move is detected by the MAC move notification feature.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogMacAddr

description: This value indicates the VLAN on which the
zxAnMasMacMoveLogMacAddr is moving.This object is instantiated
only when zxAnMasMacMoveReportEnable value is set to enable(1)
and a MAC move is detected by the MAC move notification feature.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogVid

description: The value of the port from which the zxAnMasMacMoveLogMacAddr
is moving on zxAnMasMacMoveLogVid.
This object is instantiated only when zxAnMasEnable and
zxAnMasMacMoveReportEnable value is set to enable(1) and a MAC
move is detected by the MAC move notification feature.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogFromIfIndex

description: The value of the sub-port from which the zxAnMasMacMoveLogMacAddr
is moving on zxAnMasMacMoveLogVid.This object is instantiated
only when zxAnMasMacMoveReportEnable value is set to enable(1)
and a MAC move is detected by the MAC move notification feature.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogFromSubIfIndex

description: The value of the port to which the zxAnMasMacMoveLogMacAddr
is moving on zxAnMasMacMoveLogVid.This object is instantiated
only when zxAnMasMacMoveReportEnable value is set to enable(1)
and a MAC move is detected by the MAC move notification feature.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogToIfIndex

description: The value of the sub-port to which the zxAnMasMacMoveLogMacAddr
is moving on zxAnMasMacMoveLogVid. This object is instantiated
only when zxAnMasMacMoveReportEnable value is set to enable(1)
and a MAC move is detected by the MAC move notification feature.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogToSubIfIndex

description: zxAnMasMacMoveForbidden means the mac move is forbbiden by
system.If both zxAnMasEnable and zxAnMasMacMoveReportEnable
is enable,zxAnMasMacMoveForbidden may be generated when a MAC
entry attempts to move between two interfaces.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveForbidden ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogMacAddr s EXAMPL ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogVid i 9999 ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogFromIfIndex i 9999 ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogFromSubIfIndex i 9999 ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogToIfIndex i 9999 ZTE-AN-MAC-ANTI-SPOOFING-MIB::zxAnMasMacMoveLogToSubIfIndex i 9999

description: This value indicates the MAC address that move between

zxAnMasMacMoveLogVid. This object is instantiated only when
zxAnMasMacMoveReportEnable value is set to enable(1) and a MAC
